title: Skeletal Pen
author: Archivist Eryndra
pages: A Lone Skeleton brings the eerie yet insightful nature of having bones brought back to life. With poetic prose, they offer combat strategies and survival tips.
Their works paint the night through a skeleton's gaze, hinting at a skeletal society lurking behind shadows. It's fascinating, yet unsettling.
This spectral scribe has penned five books, providing a glimpse into the undead's world that many adventurers do not see.
